snippet.title: On Your Tail | Nintendo Switch Release Date Reveal | Humble Games
snippet.description:
Prepare to explore the charming town of Borgo Marina in this delightful detective adventure on Nintendo Switch, releasing on March 13th! Diana, an intrepid writer looking for a bit of inspiration, travels to the small seaside town of Borgo Marina but finds herself swept up in a string of thefts around the once-quiet town. Use your handy Chronolens to look into the past and find clues, then use your amateur detective skills to solve the problems plaguing the town! 

A getaway isn't all about work though. Diana will meet the diverse residents of Borgo Marina, and depending on how you spend your time, they may even become her friend (or something more?)!

How will you spend your time in Borgo Marina? Will you catch the thief plunging the town into chaos? Find out in On Your Tail!

Wishlist it today on the Nintendo Switch Store: https://bit.ly/NintendoSwitch_OnYourTail_YT

Not a Nintendo Gamer? 
Get On Your Tail on Steam:  https://bit.ly/Steampage_OnYourTail_YT
